backend/main.mo: Motoko canister storing contact messages with validation and query/submit methods.

frontend/DEPLOYMENT_CHECKLIST.md: Deployment checklist outlining backend deploy, frontend build, runtime steps, and diagnostics format.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles and CSS variables defining light/dark theme tokens applied globally.

frontend/src/index.css: Global styles including Tailwind layers, color variables, viewport handling, and safe-area support.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider.

frontend/src/pages/ContactPanel.tsx: Implements a contact form panel with fields, validation, message submission, and message list loading.
frontend/src/pages/ExportPanel.tsx: Provides a panel for downloading a static WordPress package and displays related instructions and limitations.
frontend/src/pages/MenuPanel.tsx: Renders a navigable menu UI with tabs for coffee, pastries, and desserts, and supports panel navigation.
frontend/src/scene/CafeScene.tsx: Sets up the cafe 3D scene with basic lighting, fallback room, navigation, and error handling hooks.
frontend/src/scene/characters/CafeCharac: Aggregates all character groups, mounting humans and dogs in one component.

frontend/src/scene/environment/CafeScene: Adds decorative props such as espresso machine, grinder, pastry case, and menu board with neon glow and label text.
frontend/src/scene/environment/Commercia: Implements a detailed commercial espresso machine model with group heads, controls, steam wands, and metallic materials.
frontend/src/scene/HomeCafeCanvas.tsx: Manages the Three.js canvas lifecycle, loading state, WebGL checks, error overlays, and mounts the CafeScene.

frontend/src/scene/hooks/useNonBlockingT: Asynchronously loads textures without blocking render and reports success or failure through diagnostics callbacks.

frontend/src/scene/hooks/useWallMapTextu: Loads and configures the green wall-map texture with wrapping, repeat, and anisotropic filtering settings.

frontend/src/scene/interactions/Inspecta: Interactive mesh that can be dragged to rotate and shows an HTML tooltip while inspecting.
frontend/src/scene/interactions/Interact: Empty file placeholder for interaction management.
frontend/src/scene/interactions/PanelPro: Floating interactive prop (card, cup, or sign) with hover/press feedback and optional 3D label.
frontend/src/scene/interactions/POIMarke: Displays rotating POI markers with hover, dwell detection, and activation callbacks.
frontend/src/scene/interactions/poiRegis: Registry defining POI IDs, labels, positions, actions, and highlight colors.
frontend/src/scene/interactions/Proximit: Detects when the camera enters predefined zones and shows an activation overlay.
frontend/src/scene/interactions/ScenePan: Empty file placeholder for panel-related scene props.
frontend/src/scene/materials/contourStyl: Helpers for creating styled mesh materials including contour, wood, metal, and overlay materials.
frontend/src/scene/SceneErrorBoundary.ts: Error boundary that catches scene render errors and signals resets via a resetKey.
frontend/src/scene/ui/SceneDegradedOverl: Overlay shown when only the basic scene loads, offering a retry button.

frontend/src/scene/ui/SceneLoadingOverla: Loading overlay with fallback degraded message and retry option after delay.

frontend/src/scene/utils/webglSupport.ts: Checks browser WebGL availability and required extensions, returning support status and reason on failure.
frontend/src/state/uiOverlayStore.ts: Zustand store managing which UI overlay panel is active.

frontend/src/theme/tokens.ts: Theme tokens for colors, typography, spacing, and radii using OKLCH color values.
frontend/src/utils/deploymentDiagnostics: Utility for logging structured deployment errors with step labels and remediation hints.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration with extended colors, typography, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing features, requests, issues, and current state for Contour Cafe.
